name: H@ck3r++
description:
Hey,

This is D3nX, and this is my second game.

This game put you into a h@ck3r, and you must type, faster as you can, the code given. Of course, you are face to AI, who can type faster than you and try to trap you !

NEW : Since alpha 4, you can select the difficulty of the AI !

Actually, that a prototype game for our indie game studio : DreamVelopper.

We hope you l'ill like it ;)

D3nX & DreamVelopper team
